replies.msg: 大家到底係唔係集中番個緊急法

以前頂多一日一至兩個活動 一早一晚 或者唔同區
宜家一日４,5個活動 仲要有D地點時間都重疊
到時文宣不足 又分散又唔夠人 真係唔知點
冇辦法，依家提前講就俾狗布陣，即時性又會唔夠人

quote.msg: 冇辦法，依家提前講就俾狗布陣，即時性又會唔夠人

replies.msg:
18 processors ( districts) doing together will succeed if each processor CAN SUPPORT themselves and EXCEL independently !

Carefully assess regularly:
1. OPTIMAL # of districts
2. ESTIMATED amount experienced protestors available on a specific district
3. if there are enough resources per district. Sometimes, a few districts CAN combine ... Just BE WATER !!!
4. physical condition -- e.g. approaching burn-out , or still very energetic
5. opponent situations and tactic for each district.

How about having a competition of which district get the least amount of arrests !

There is no ABSOLUTE right or wrong to whether doing 1 BIG processor or donig 18. It is an ART !!

EXAMINE and ADJUST continously !!!

replies.msg:
我個人認為快閃暫時係最為有用，同時又可以向唔同區整合成為一大班人。重點係分散警力，等班狗到A點時我地已經係B點，C點做緊嘢

另外有鑒於之前幾次都係因為冇哨兵都好似好多手足俾人捉
